message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $10,000 is fair. What do you think?

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in purchasing the product, but $10,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $6,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, however, $6,500 is significantly below its true value. Could you consider $9,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd be willing to meet you halfway, but I think $7,500 is the most I can stretch to. Would you be willing to consider that?
